field.name: description
field.value: ActiveRecordBase declares the Serializable-attribute, whereas the ActiveRecordLinqBase doesn't. As the ActiveRecordLinqBase class doesn't define anything besides a static property, adding the attribute shouldn't have any side-effects. I've added the attribute in a custom build, which solves our issue with serialization.
